SEARCH
Module overrungl.glfw
Package overrungl.glfw

Interface IGLFWWindowFocusFun

All Superinterfaces:
Callback
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface IGLFWWindowFocusFun extends Callback
IGLFWWindowFocusFun relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • IGLFWWindowFocusFun refers to one or more preview APIs: FunctionDescriptor, MemorySegment.
Programs can only use IGLFWWindowFocusFun when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
This is the function pointer type for window focus callbacks. A window focus callback function has the following signature: 
@Invoker(IGLFWWindowFocusFun::invoke)
void functionName(MemorySegment window, boolean focused);
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
See Also:
  • GLFW.setWindowFocusCallback(java.lang.foreign.MemorySegment, overrungl.glfw.IGLFWWindowFocusFun)PREVIEW

  • Method Details

    • invoke

      void invoke(MemorySegmentPREVIEW window, boolean focused)
      The function pointer type for window focus callbacks.
      Parameters:
      window - The window that gained or lost input focus.
      focused - true if the window was given input focus, or false if it lost it.

      Throws:
